survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of networking opportunities at professional conferences and identify areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How satisfied were you with the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use a multi-select format to capture all relevant responses.

script.question_text: Which of the following networking formats did you participate in? (Select all that apply)

questions.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the networking opportunities at the conference?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback. Keep the field size appropriate for mobile users.

script.question_text: What was the most valuable aspect of the networking opportunities at the conference?

questions.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking opportunities provided?
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistent measurement. Ensure the question is mobile-friendly.

script.question_text: How likely are you to attend this conference again based on the networking opportunities provided?

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future networking opportunities at this conference?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather actionable feedback. Keep the field size appropriate for mobile users.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future networking opportunities at this conference?
